original_solution_mapping.L1: The 19 students will divide equally the remaining $90 - $14 = $76.
original_solution_mapping.L2: So, each student will contribute $76 / 19 students = $<<76/19=4>>4/student.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3516.
    Returns: the amount each student will contribute.
    """
    # L1
    total_contribution_needed = 90 # each class will contribute $90
    class_funds = 14 # has $14 class funds
    remaining_amount_to_divide = total_contribution_needed - class_funds

    # L2
    number_of_students = 19 # among 19 students
    contribution_per_student = remaining_amount_to_divide / number_of_students

    # FA
    answer = contribution_per_student
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The 19 students will divide equally the remaining ${total_contribution_needed} - ${class_funds} = ${remaining_amount_to_divide}.

So, each student will contribute ${remaining_amount_to_divide} / {number_of_students} students = $<<{remaining_amount_to_divide}/{number_of_students}={contribution_per_student}>>{contribution_per_student}/student.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: The 19 students will divide equally the remaining $90 - $14 = $76.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: So, each student will contribute $76 / 19 students = $<<76/19=57>>57/student.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '/' but used '-' instead.
